Name: HMS Birmingham
Propulsion:
Four-shaft Parsons geared turbines
Four Admiralty 3-drum boilers
75,000 shp (56,000 kW)
Armament:
12[1] × 6-inch (152 mm) Mk XXIII guns[2] [triple mounts]
8 × QF 4-inch (102 mm) Mk XVI guns [double mounts]
4 × 3-pounder
8 × QF 2-pounder (40 mm) AA guns [quadruple mounts]
Torpedo tubes: 6 × 21-inch (533 mm)
